amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds made available by this Act may be used to provide funding for the position of Public Advocate within U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds made available by this Act may be used to provide funding for the position of Public Advocate within U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Black amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
